metadata.name: ELEVATE: THE GENESIS #1/10
metadata.description:
This NFT was inspired by a spontaneous desire to communicate with other grateful human beings on a regular basis. The idea is that this NFT allows you access to a private Galactic Gratitude chat that is only accessible to those who hold this NFT. It will be a gathering of the grateful and a place to share, grow and stay connected with other beautiful humans around gratitude.

If you are gifted this NFT, it is because I am deeply grateful for our connection and I know you to be a grateful human being who would find value in being in such a group.

I will periodically open up new editions for purchase, however, this private chat is intended for a very select group of humans who find immense value in sharing things they are grateful for, participation is 100% voluntary.

If you are a holder of this NFT and wish to access the private chat please visit: https://www.ourspaces.xyz/chat/zSz37c0zPPUwleHGEaBD
